p: The department of Meta, with a population of 961 292, was fourth among the departments in Colombia that registered the most confirmed cases of pregnancy‐related Zika virus infections (8.7%), behind Norte de Santander (16.8%), Valle del Cauca (12.9%), and Huila (10.8%). 10 Meta contributed to the overall national burden, with around 9% of confirmed infections and 2% of newborns with microcephaly.
